/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings on one side and verdant trees on the other. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a smattering of clouds. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of grandeur to the scene. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
